name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-myemails
title: My Notifications
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension shows current users email using Microsoft Graph.
longDescription: This sample shows how to build an ACE with a PrimaryText card view and a quick view to display current logged in user's emails.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
